overview: College is a special time in a young woman's life. Campus Confessions #4 lays bare the magical moments when innocent ladies mature into full-fledged sluts. Cocksucking, slurping jizz and catching foot-long pricks in the ass; these talents aren't learned in class. The sex-starved tramps of Campus Confessions #4 prefer the hands-on approach. Every day is another lesson in lust. Every night, another man to please. Youthful experimentation is a beautiful thing. Campus Confessions #4 is shameless coed lust incarnate.
title: Campus Confessions 4
